Anniversary of Guinean independence marked 
    Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held here on Sept. 27 to commemorate the 43rd anniversary of the independence of Guinea.
 Present at the meeting were Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is vice-chairman of the Korea-Guinea Friendship Association, and members of the friendship association together with working people in the city.    
 A congratulatory message to the Guinean President was adopted after a speech at the meeting.
